labels.name: note:ocr-generated-content
labels.description: The report contains OCR generated content that has not been reviewed.

reports_summary: Based on community testing, The Outer Worlds 2 runs in the low 30s on both Steam Deck LCD and OLED when visuals are pulled down and an upscaler is enabled, giving a mostly steady feel aside from a small stutter when first entering a settlement. Testers kept graphics at low-to-medium to preserve frame pacing, and one report noted roughly two hours of battery life with those settings. The clearest ways to improve consistency are using the upscaler and reducing reflections or heavy post-processing.
